SELECT i.img AS img, i.name AS name, i.price as price, i.items_id as items_id, SUM(CASE WHEN o.status = 3 THEN od.amount ELSE 0 END) AS sold_count FROM items AS i LEFT JOIN orderdetail AS od ON i.items_id = od.items_items_id LEFT JOIN `order` AS o ON od.order_idorder = o.idorder GROUP BY i.items_id ORDER BY sold_count DESC LIMIT 4;
